messages.text: Lots of uncertainty right now though, so not sure if it’s worth planning much now

elements.text: Lots of uncertainty right now though, so not sure if it’s worth planning much now

messages.text: Yep, we will definitely have one if we can

elements.text: Yep, we will definitely have one if we can

messages.text:
Hey Bay Area peoples :wave:

<https://discourse.julialang.org/t/save-the-date-juliacon-2021/51940/3>

The dates for JuliaCon 2021 have been announced and it will be online. However, by July, we _might_ be able to have a small gathering. If that is the case, it might be cool to have a small satellite JuliaCon event here.

It doesn't make a lot of sense to discuss it here on the Slack hole though (anything we say here will be gone in a few days) so I created a Zulip stream for us:

<https://julialang.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/268752-bayarea-local>

attachments.title: Save the date: JuliaCon 2021
attachments.text: Awesome! :tada: I agree it is prudent to make the main event online, but by July, I suspect it might be ok in certain parts of the world to have small gatherings so maybe there can be local satellite events around the world by then. If it makes sense, I’d love to have a Bay Area (SF) satellite event and happy to help organize.

attachments.title: JuliaLang
attachments.text: This is the Zulip server for the Julia programming language community. We ask anyone joining to adhere to the Julia Code of Conduct. | To learn more about Julia, check out <https://julialang.org/>, or just come ask us here! | You can reach out to the admins of this Zulip by sending a direct message to @zulip-admins.
